title: Streaming View: An Efficient Data Processing Engine for Modern Real-time Data Warehouse of Alibaba Cloud
authors: Fangyuan Zhang, Mengqi Wu, Chunlei Xu, Yunong Bao, Jiyu Qiao, Yingli Zhou, Hua Fan, Caihua Yin, Wenchao Zhou, Feifei Li

summary.objective: Alibaba Cloud의 현대 실시간 DW를 위한 효율적 데이터 처리 엔진
